item.title: PCA analysis on scATACseq data
item.description: To not miss a post like this, sign up for my newsletter to learn computational biology and bioinformatics. In my last post, I showed you how to use PCA for bulk RNAseq data. Today, letâ€™s see how we can use it for scATACseq data. Download the example dataset from 10x genomics https://support.10xgenomics.com/single-cell-atac/datasets/1.1.0/atac_pbmc_5k_v1 The dataset is 5k Peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) from a healthy donor (v1.0). Download the atac_pbmc_5k_v1_filtered_peak_bc_matrix.tar.gz file and unzip it.
